nodes.text: The Unfinished colossus was a unfinished monument located on the swampy jungle world of Dromund Kaas. The statue was originally supposed to be made in honor of the Dark Lord of the Sith Vowrawn, and Vowrawn's apprentice Qet brought several hundred slaves from offworld to the planet in order to build it. However, the slaves began the Dromund Kaas slave rebellion that would trouble the world for years and the statue was never completed.
